name: I3Engineering
0:
”Alexa, turn on lamp”
”Alexa, dim lamp by ten percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With the i3 Engineering Skill, you can now use the Alexa to interact with your smart home products using the power of your voice. i3 Engineering products support direct actions for quick and easy control. 

Before you can connect Alexa with i3 Engineering smart devices, you need to follow these steps:
1. Download "i3 Engineering" app from Google Play or App Store.
2. Sign up or sign in with your i3 Engineering account.
3. Setup the device with your "i3 Engineering" app, and make sure you can control it in the app.
4. Open Alexa app, search "i3 Engineering" skill and enable it by signing in with the same ID you used in "i3 Engineering" app.
5. After the setup is finished, you can control the device with Alexa.

Devices compatible with Alexa: LED smart bulb, smart socket, smart plug, smart fan

ASK YOUR ASSISTANT:

Turn off the lights
Turn on my lights
Turn on the bedroom lamps
Turn off the lights in the kitchen
Are the lights on in the living room?
Is the light on in playroom?
